item.title: Liveblog: Linkerd 2.0, Now with Extra Prometheus
item.description: This is a liveblog of the KubeCon NA 2018 session titled “Linkerd 2.0, Now with Extra Prometheus.” The speakers are Frederic Branczyk from Red Hat and Andrew Seigner with Buoyant.
